name: tm85
effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text.platinum: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
